dependencies.description:
Lightweight but flexible shim designed to rectify the incompatibilities
between the Accelerate/vecLib BLAS and LAPACK libraries shipped with
macOS and FORTRAN code compiled with modern compilers such as GNU
Fortran.
dependencies.name: blas

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Lightweight but flexible shim designed to rectify the incompatibilities
between the Accelerate/vecLib BLAS and LAPACK libraries shipped with
macOS and FORTRAN code compiled with modern compilers such as GNU
Fortran.
dependencies.name: lapack

dependencies.description:
Heavily optimized library for DEFLATE/zlib/gzip compression and
decompression
dependencies.name: libdeflate

dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.
dependencies.name: zlib

dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.
dependencies.name: zlib-api

dependencies.description:
Zstandard, or zstd as short version, is a fast lossless compression
algorithm, targeting real-time compression scenarios at zlib-level and
better compression ratios.
dependencies.name: zstd

description:
PLINK2: Whole genome association analysis toolset, designed to perform a
range of basic, large-scale analyses in a computationally efficient
manner.
name: plink2

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
